title: Survive the AI age: Managing AI generated content with Notion, Python, Vercel, and Cron.
description:
OpenAI has placed the power of AI at your fingertips, but how will you manage it?
How you manage your AGC will likely determine your success.
In this video we break down a simple yet effective approach to managing AI generated content.
With the help of Python, Notion, Vercel, Qstash, and of course - OpenAI's GPT APIs, we program a solution for AGC management.

We've built this code base up over several videos (link below) so the complexity is increasing. Feel free to ask any questions if you're curious or something doesn't make sense.

Stay focused.
Keep Building.
